title: Mandelbrot Set with p5.js
description: In this coding challenge, I program from scratch the Mandelbrot set with p5.js

timestamps.title: Introducing today's coding challenge: the Mandelbrot set
The Mandelbrot set is all of the complex numbers that stay bounded
The initial sketch sets every pixel to gray
Calculate the real and complex components for the next generation
What does it mean to be bounded?
Set the brightness based on number of iterations
Store the original values of a and b
Set the brightness by maping to maxIterations
Add sliders to add ability to zoom in on the Mandelbrot set

codeExamples.title: Mandelbrot Set
codeExamples.description: This sketch visualizes the Mandelbrot set.
